ARGUMENT
x y z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rngidl.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 2 |  | rngidl.2 | |- X = ran G |
| 3 |  | #P_ssid | |- X C_ X |
| 4 | 3 | #P_a1i | |- ( R e. RingOps -> X C_ X ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( GId ` G ) = ( GId ` G ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 5 | #P_rngo0cl | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( GId ` G ) e. X ) |
| 7 | 1, 2 | #P_rngogcl | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ x e. X /\ y e. X ) -> ( x G y ) e. X ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_3expa | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ x e. X ) /\ y e. X ) -> ( x G y ) e. X ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ x e. X ) -> A. y e. X ( x G y ) e. X ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 2nd ` R ) = ( 2nd ` R ) |
| 11 | 1, 10, 2 | #P_rngocl | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ z e. X /\ x e. X ) -> ( z ( 2nd ` R ) x ) e. X ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_3com23 | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ x e. X /\ z e. X ) -> ( z ( 2nd ` R ) x ) e. X ) |
| 13 | 1, 10, 2 | #P_rngocl | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ x e. X /\ z e. X ) -> ( x ( 2nd ` R ) z ) e. X ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_jca | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ x e. X /\ z e. X ) -> ( ( z ( 2nd ` R ) x ) e. X /\ ( x ( 2nd ` R ) z ) e. X ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_3expa | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ x e. X ) /\ z e. X ) -> ( ( z ( 2nd ` R ) x ) e. X /\ ( x ( 2nd ` R ) z ) e. X ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ x e. X ) -> A. z e. X ( ( z ( 2nd ` R ) x ) e. X /\ ( x ( 2nd ` R ) z ) e. X ) ) |
| 17 | 9, 16 | #P_jca | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ x e. X ) -> ( A. y e. X ( x G y ) e. X /\ A. z e. X ( ( z ( 2nd ` R ) x ) e. X /\ ( x ( 2nd ` R ) z ) e. X ) ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( R e. RingOps -> A. x e. X ( A. y e. X ( x G y ) e. X /\ A. z e. X ( ( z ( 2nd ` R ) x ) e. X /\ ( x ( 2nd ` R ) z ) e. X ) ) ) |
| 19 | 1, 10, 2, 5 | #P_isidl | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( X e. ( Idl ` R ) <-> ( X C_ X /\ ( GId ` G ) e. X /\ A. x e. X ( A. y e. X ( x G y ) e. X /\ A. z e. X ( ( z ( 2nd ` R ) x ) e. X /\ ( x ( 2nd ` R ) z ) e. X ) ) ) ) ) |
| 20 | 4, 6, 18, 19 | #P_mpbir3and | |- ( R e. RingOps -> X e. ( Idl ` R ) ) |
